sentences.en: A male goat rests on the exposed root ball of a palm tree on Tahiti Island.
sentences.cn: 一头山羊在大溪地岛上的棕榈树下裸露的球形根茎上休息.

sentences.en: How about a 55-day round trip from California to Australia and New Zealand via Tahiti and Mexico?
sentences.cn: 从加州途径塔希提岛和墨西哥前往澳大利亚和新西兰往返55天的行程怎么样？

sentences.en: Infrasound from ocean waves observed in Tahiti.
Monoi de Tahiti Oil - Moisturises and helps to protect and condition the skin and hair.
sentences.cn: 大溪地栀子花油 - 有效保护、修护肌肤和秀发.

sentences.en: Tahiti is also much less crowded compared to other popular dive sites.
sentences.cn: 相较于其他热闹的潜水地,大溪地也较不拥挤.

sentences.en: Tahiti is famous for its world - class diving.
sentences.cn: 大溪地以身为 世界级 的潜水地点而闻名.

sentences.en: Tahiti is one of the most popular island vacation spots in the world.
sentences.cn: 大溪地是全世界最热门的度假岛屿之一.

sentences.en: Tahiti lies in the South Pacific.
sentences.cn: 塔希提岛位于南太平洋。

sentences.en: Tahiti nut, worked or moulded ( excl. buttons and blanks thered )
sentences.cn: 塔希提岛榈坚果, 已加工或模制 ( 不包括钮扣及钮扣的坯料 )

sentences.en: Tamanu oil is from Tahiti and is known for its capacity to regenerate scar tissue.
sentences.cn: 塔玛纽油是来自大溪地,因为其再生伤疤组织的能力而闻名.

sentences.en: The beautiful island of Tahiti is located south of the Equator.
sentences.cn: 美丽的大溪地位于赤道以南.

sentences.en: The hulls were built by Choco Indians in the Darien Providence of Panama and shipped to Tahiti.
sentences.cn: 它的船身是在巴拿马的达里恩省由巧克族印第安人做的，然后运到塔希提岛来。

sentences.en: The language which the Maori speak is related to the languages of Tahiti and Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 毛利人所说的语言同塔希提岛和夏威夷的语言是有关的.

sentences.en: The only serious stress is laid upon the degradation of Tahiti.
sentences.cn: 唯一严肃的地方是把塔希提岛奚落了一番.

sentences.en: This is why Tahiti is the ideal place to get away from it all.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么大溪地是个能让人远离尖嚣的理想国度.

sentences.en: This was a problem for observers elsewhere, too, not only Cook in Tahiti.
sentences.cn: 不仅是塔西提岛的库克, 这对其他地方的观测者同样是个问题.

sentences.en: Tom is taking me a vacation in Tahiti.
sentences.cn: 汤姆要带我去大溪地度假.

sentences.en: What when the steamer reached Tahiti?
sentences.cn: 游船抵达塔希提后他要做什么?
